Title: Successful User Registration
Description: Verify that a new user can register with valid email, password, and name. Ensure the system creates the account, encrypts the password, and returns 201 with profile data (excluding password).
Acceptance Criteria: Given valid user details (email, password, name), the system creates a new user account successfully.
Password is encrypted using BCrypt before storing in database.
System returns 201 Created status with user profile data (excluding password) on successful registration.

Title: Duplicate Email Registration
Description: Verify that attempting to register with an already registered email returns a 400 error and appropriate message.
Acceptance Criteria: Given an already registered email, the system returns a 400 error with message 'Email already exists'.

Title: Invalid Email Format
Description: Verify that registration fails with a 400 error and validation message when the email format is invalid.
Acceptance Criteria: Given invalid email format, the system returns a 400 error with validation message.

Title: Password Too Short
Description: Verify that registration fails with a 400 error and message when the password is less than 8 characters.
Acceptance Criteria: Given password less than 8 characters, the system returns a 400 error with message 'Password must be at least 8 characters'.

Title: Password Encryption Verification
Description: Ensure that the user's password is stored encrypted using BCrypt and not in plain text.
Acceptance Criteria: Password is encrypted using BCrypt before storing in database.

Title: Response Data Excludes Password
Description: Verify that the response data on successful registration does not include the password field.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns 201 Created status with user profile data (excluding password) on successful registration.

Title: Boundary Test: Password Length Exactly 8
Description: Verify that a password of exactly 8 characters is accepted and registration is successful.
Acceptance Criteria: Given password with exactly 8 characters, registration is successful and returns 201 with user profile data.

Title: Boundary Test: Maximum Email Length
Description: Verify registration with an email at maximum allowed length (e.g., 254 characters).
Acceptance Criteria: Given email at maximum allowed length, registration is successful and returns 201 with user profile data.

Title: Missing Required Fields
Description: Verify that registration fails with a 400 error when required fields (email, password, or name) are missing.
Acceptance Criteria: System returns a 400 error indicating missing required fields.
